headline: With Workday Leaning Into AI, Is Its Turnaround Working? Should Investors Buy the Stock Right Now?
summary: With shares trading slightly below where they finished trading at toward the end of 2021, Workday (NASDAQ: WDAY) needs to reinvigorate its stock price.  Despite the recent gains, the financial and human capital management software company is still down more than 10% over the past year, as of this writing.  For its fiscal 2025 Q4 ended January 31, Workday was able to produce results that topped analyst expectations.
